theme.title: Health and Lifestyle Balance
theme.description: Discover a life of wellness and energy. Uncover the path to vitality through holistic health practices, nourishing body and mind.

title: Secret of Water
languages: Audio Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Français

comments.name: Michael Lyons
comments.comment: Distilled water does not have minerals, salt, .... It's pure water, so only molecule H2O. I believe that the mice that drink distilled water died because distilled water attracts (through osmosis) important minerals and other water-soluble nutrients out of the cells. In the long run, these mice die because of a lack of minerals.

comments.name: Gary Coutirier
comments.comment: J'ai beaucoup aimé, dorénavant je vais faire jouer de la musique relaxante avant de boire l'eau dans ma carafe.

comments.name: Theodore Duncan
comments.comment: I recently went through Dr. Emoto's book, 'The Hidden Messages In Water'. It is a must-read. I enjoyed this video as much as I enjoyed the book. The video is done fantastically. Thank you so much. This is such an important message.
